trans-unit.source: Represents a column of a table or view in the data store accessed through a data connection.
trans-unit.target: 表示表或视图通过数据连接访问数据存储区中的列。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataColumn class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataColumn 类是表示在设计时数据存储的架构的几种类型之一。

trans-unit.source: These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
trans-unit.target: 这些架构项都由实现的设计器提供给控件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 控件通过调用访问架构对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>接口方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref> class with the specified name and data type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref>使用指定的名称和数据类型的类。

trans-unit.source: Use the DesignerDataColumn to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DesignerDataColumn 设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other properties are set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他属性均设置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: The name identifying the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 标识数据存储区中的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref> class with the specified name, data type, and default value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref>类具有指定的名称、 数据类型和默认值。

trans-unit.source: Use the DesignerDataColumn constructor to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DefaultValue%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DesignerDataColumn 构造函数设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DefaultValue%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other properties are set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他属性均设置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: The name identifying the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 标识数据存储区中的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the column.
trans-unit.target: 列的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref>用指定的值的类。

trans-unit.source: Use the DesignerDataColumn constructor to set all the properties of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DesignerDataColumn 构造函数设置的所有属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn>对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn>

trans-unit.source: The name identifying the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 标识数据存储区中的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the column
trans-unit.target: 列的默认值

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the field is the identity field of the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字段是数据行; 的标识字段否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the field can be null in the data store; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在数据存储; 字段可以为 null否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the field is the primary key of the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该字段是数据行中; 的主键否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of digits used by a numeric data field.
trans-unit.target: 最大的数值数据域使用的数字个数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of digits to the right of the decimal point in a numeric data field.
trans-unit.target: 最大数值数据字段中小数点右侧位数数。

trans-unit.source: The length of the data field, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 数据字段，以字节为单位的长度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data type of the data column.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据列的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value of the data column.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据列的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the data column.
trans-unit.target: 数据列的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data column is an identity column for the data row.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示数据列是否为标识列的数据行。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> of the column is an identity column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果列是标识列;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length in bytes of the data column.
trans-unit.target: 获取以字节为单位的数据列的长度。

trans-unit.source: The length of the data column, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 数据列，以字节为单位的长度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 在数据存储中获取列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 数据存储区中的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the column can be null in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示列是否可以为 null 在数据存储。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column can be null in the data store; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在数据存储; 列可以为 null否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of digits in a numeric data column.
trans-unit.target: 获取数值数据列中的数字位数。

trans-unit.source: The number of digits in a numeric data column.
trans-unit.target: 数值数据列中的数字个数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the column is part of the table's primary key.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示列是否为表的主键的一部分。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column is part of the table's primary key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果列是表的主键; 的一部分否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of digits to the right of the decimal point in a numeric column.
trans-unit.target: 获取数字列中的小数点右侧的位数。

trans-unit.source: The number of digits to the right of the decimal point in a numeric column.
trans-unit.target: 数字列中的小数点右侧的数字个数。
